description: This file is an ESLint configuration file written in modern JavaScript syntax, defining linting standards for a project using Next.js with TypeScript.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Variable holding the absolute path of the current file.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Variable holding the directory path of the current file.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method used to extend multiple ESLint configurations.
